2.name: 13 colors
2.description: 13 colors with 13 pieces each. Instant win conditions are 13 pieces of one color or 10 pieces of three adjacent colors

3.name: 13-color hex
3.description: The pieces are placed as a 8-sided hexagon. Each piece has 6 adjacent pieces around it. You may only take pieces with at least 3 consecutive open sides. All other rules are like the '13 colors' variant
